title: Social-SERAS Epilepsy
description:
Social-SERAS helps you to keep track of your daily life with epilepsy. Manage easily and quickly your seizure records and your daily activity. All the data is stored in a calendar so you can share all the recorded information with your neurologist, including seizure evolution and patterns. 
Be a part of our community!

This is a project born from the experience of its founder, father of a girl with refractory epilepsy diagnosed more than 16 years ago. MJN offers technological solutions specially designed for people with epilepsy in order to improve their quality of life.
Social-SERAS is a crisis calendar that is characterized by being simple and intuitive. In very few steps you can control the main functionalities of the application:
- Seizure journal: register your crisis and check your data on the calendar.
- Daily activity summary: save your activity data to describe what factors can influence your crises. 
- Physical activity records: Social-SERAS counts your daily steps automatically. You can link the app to the i7E wristband for more accurate physical activity records.
- Statistics consultation: you will be able to automatically consult the graph of the evolution of your seizures and print all the information in PDF format to share it when and with whom you want.
All the data provided by the community is analysed in an accumulative way in order to improve the knowledge about epilepsy. At MJN we guarantee that the records are treated in a totally anonymous and secure manner and are not used for any commercial purpose, only for research purposes.

Social-SERAS will be compatible with our earpiece device that continuously evaluates the risk of epilepsy seizures. 

It is a free application and without advertising. Be a part of our community, be a part of MJN, and help us improve the knowledge of epilepsy.
